links.title: Study Finds Cannabis Compounds Prevent Infection By Covid-19 Virus
links.description: Compounds in cannabis can prevent infection from the virus that causes Covid-19 by blocking its entry into cells, according to a study published this week by researchers affiliated with Oregon State University. A report on the research, "Cannabinoids Block Cellular Entry of SARS-CoV-2 and the Emerging Variants," was published online on Monday by the Journal of Natural Products.

body:
@adamister44 I'm a bull whobwould love to see it go to bargain prices. The dumb ass is the 🍎 bear that doesn't understand what a great opportunity to add that is. 

Here's a secret, you silly bear, long term $aapl goes up. These fluctuations are just part of being in the stock market. If you can't handle them, buy savings bonds!

$AAPL if I was a bull would I be looking to enter long here with fed tightening. Tech looking extremely weak. Poor economic data. Near record highs. Not a chance. More sellers than buyers see you at 150 dumbass bulls. 😹

body: $AAPL was analyzed by 49 analysts. The buy consensus is at 84%. So analysts seem to be very confident about $AAPL. https://www.chartmill.com/stock/analyzer/stock/AAPL?view=analyst-ratings&utm_source=stocktwits&utm_medium=ANALYST&utm_content=AAPL&utm_campaign=social_tracking

@tpanikorn "where apps have never gone before"

Remember apps folks. $BB, then $AAPL & $GOOG - the explosion began. What made these two tickers trillion dollar companies. Ecosystem first, then apps, and of course a run at HW. Apple their own, Android by licensing and own. 

TITANS CAME & WENT WITH PHONES AND APPS. Nokia, HTC,LG, SONY, MSFT.  Two remain, Google and Apple.

We know the largest phone manuf. in world is $SSNLF followed by $AAPL. Two different ecosystems, two brands of apps, and massive digital penetration of/connection to nearly every human on earth. Literally. Who is not connected in some way to IOS or android? And their apps? And effectively to their own or commoditized HW. THE ENTIRE WORLD connect to the IOS or Android +/-

There is ONE secure end to end ecosystem for the IoT world.It is simply $BB. That means apps, money, and the world as their consumer. Bullish and there is upside to this SP

Oh, and by the way, Samsung is much more than phone. Long time BB partner

https://www.samsung.com/global/ir/ir-events-presentations/business-introduction/

body: $AAPL We will see when earning report are released shortly.  It finished up and strong. Hopefully on the way back to $180.  I look forward to Tuesday.

The first sign a trade is wrong is that you're loosing money. 
The second sign a trade is wrong is that you still think you're right. 
 
$SPY $TSLA $AAPL $BA $ARKK  
 
#TakeNOTES 
#Lessons 
#HAGW
$AAPL Covid pulled years of sales forward, this was in stagnation mode prior.  Big misses incoming all 2022.  Ready for a 25% drop in February, I am!!

$SPY $AMD $QQQ $AAPL

Christ almighty (and He is almighty), but what the flip was FED Brainerd thinking when said, "we will get back to FED funds target rate by end of 2022" ?

THAT is what scared the eek out of markets yesterday and, really, it should have been continuation today.
Someone said, "bull trap," because we ticked 459  to complete diamond pattern before zipping up.

So yeah, gap secured, now what? 

Well, at risk of repeating myself, I think 2018 mirrors this market in 2021 perfectly, FOR SAME TYPE MONSTER DROP, with AMD ER day merely as timeline , Oct. 26, '18, having a decent ER, but tech dropped 600 on the day and DOW over 1000. 
S&P, of course, a radical # too. AMD SUNk.
Now all the insane 2-month volatility following AMD ER led to sev 3 to 5% days' in markets w/ culmination of a RECESSION only 0.25% away on Dec. 21, 2018, technical recession, a 25% S&P drop.

So, yes, a bear market like that en route w/ inflation 7% (and climbing fast), Wage Inflation compounds + rates
$NVDA $FB $MSFT  $RBLX   $AAPL  stock must have in long terms account. IMO

$AAPL Going back to all time highs!

Apple is a, Value, Inflation, Relative strength, Safety, EV, inflation (price power), streaming, industrial, tech, massive buy back and cash flow, momentum play, Other than that it really doesn’t have much going for it!
Make $AAPL your portfolios forever stock. Dollar cost average in over the next year or two, hold for the next 30 years. Ignore the silly bear/bull drama.
